abstract: As Bank of America and the Securities and Exchange Commission continue to wrangle with a federal judge over a settlement agreement, Forbes.com is taking note of a few words in the judge’s recent order that might give pause to high-powered deal lawyers.
snippet: As Bank of America and the Securities and Exchange Commission continue to wrangle with a federal judge over a settlement agreement, Forbes.com is taking note of a few words in the judge’s recent order that might give pause to high-powered deal law...
lead_paragraph: As Bank of America and the Securities and Exchange Commission continue to wrangle with a federal judge over a settlement agreement, Forbes.com is taking note of a few words in the judge’s recent order that might give pause to high-powered deal lawyers.

headline.main: Lawyers May Feel Chill From Judge’s Words
